ul.li: In general, you should follow the instruction at Yesod in 5 minutes.

conbody.note: It is generally recommended to create new projects using the Yesod scaffolder tool by running yesod init. This book will mostly do things manually for instructive purposes, but for real world projects, even I use the scaffolder to get the basic setup correct.
